name: Morna Tales
description:
www.mornatales.com

Free 2D MMORPG. Play as one of 4 classes (Fighter, Scoundrel, Wizard, or Priest). Choose a Subpath from 16 unique paths (4 per base class). 19 Crafting professions so far. PVE, PVP, Tons of mini games to play like Beach Wars, Elixir Wars, Zombie Hunts, Sumo Fights, and more. Fantasy setting in a dungeons and dragons style world. Join a growing community and make your legend known!
